content: --सर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} going or moving in front. (--रः {1} a fore-runner, harbinger; <ls>Ś. 4. 1.</ls> {2} a follower, attendant; servant; परिमेयपुरःसरौ <ls>R. 1. 37.</ls> {3} a leader, one who leads the way, foremost, pre-eminent; <ls>Ku. 6. 49.</ls> {4} (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) attended or preceded by, with; as मानपुरःसरं, प्रणामपुरःसरं, वृकपुरःसराः &c. (--रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} with or after.
